para.programlisting:
<xs:schema xmlns:xs="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema" xmlns="http://www.zorba-xquery.org/schema" targetNamespace="http://www.zorba-xquery.org/schema" elementFormDefault="qualified">
<xs:element name="product" type="ProductType"/>
<xs:complexType name="ProductType"> <xs:attribute name="data" type="xs:base64Binary"/> </xs:complexType>
</xs:schema>
